title: NVIDIA GENAI Developer Contest (Received Honorable Mention)
description: For NVIDIA's Generative AI developer contest, I created a project called Persona, which placed me among the top 10 projects for the contest. Peronsa integrates Large-Language-Models into Unreal Engine, to power dynamic and immersive dialogues for characters in video games.

title: Unreal Engine Game Development
description: I have always dreamt of developing video-games, with full creative control over the entire project. In the beginning of 2024, I started to learn game development as a hobby. I started with Unity, and eventually made my way to Unreal Engine, while working on various projects with the engines to build up my skills. I am picking up skills in everything from game mechanics and level/environement design, to sound design and writing. I am currently in the early stages of developing a large game project (more info to come).
